print

public static void print(java.lang.String msg,
                         int line)
Sets a message to display on a certain lines of the display. The message will appear during the next screen refresh. It is a static method, so it can be called from anywhere in the code.

Parameters:
msg - the message to show
line - the line of the screen on which the message should be printed

print

public static void print(double msg,
                         int line)
Sets a double to display on a certain lines of the display. The double will appear during the next screen refresh. It is a static method, so it can be called from anywhere in the code.

Parameters:
msg - the double to show
line - the line of the screen on which the double should be printed
